keyEvents.description: Igaram's ship explodes in the harbor shortly after departure, creating a massive fireball visible from the town.
keyEvents.significance: The explosion marks a turning point, demonstrating the deadly consequences of opposing Baroque Works and the danger Vivi faces.

keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew departs Whisky Peak aboard the Going Merry, setting course for Little Garden.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Whisky Peak Arc as the crew leaves the island behind and commits to the dangerous journey ahead.

keyEvents.description: Miss All Sunday mysteriously appears on the Going Merry, infiltrating the ship without detection.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Robin's stealth abilities and establishes the ship as a location where crucial confrontations occur. Shows that even the crew's home base is not safe from infiltration.

keyEvents.description: Luffy destroys the Eternal Pose on the deck of the Going Merry, making his defining declaration of independence.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry serves as the stage for one of Luffy's most iconic character moments, reinforcing the ship as a symbol of the crew's freedom and autonomy.
